name: Safe Zone (itch) (rinviole)
description:
Avoid obstacles, stay in the zone.

It started as a practice project but I ended up completing it(somehow). Please let me know your thoughts. Thank you!

Full screen recommended.

How to play:

Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move.

Press F to activate shield.

Press Space to activate destroy all power.

You can find the project here: https://github.com/rinviole/safe-zone-project
